items.sentence: Promise me that you won't swear around my children.
Eating out is something that I don't do very often.
Some of the things that Tom said didn't make sense.
I know that Tom is quicker at doing that than Mary.
I'll be returning to Australia sometime next month.
When was the last time you went to a movie theater?
I was born in the same house as my grandfather was.
You were late for school this morning, weren't you?
We want to get a dog eventually, but not right now.
We don't have any children, but we have three dogs.
Tom has been spending more and more time in Boston.
Tom's dog attacked the cat that came into our yard.
Tom was walking his dog when he got hit by a truck.
I think that everyone here knows Tom can't do that.
The train stopped suddenly and I spilled my coffee.
It takes a lot of patience to raise a kid like Tom.
I didn't realize Tom didn't live in Boston anymore.
I had some interesting experiences while traveling.
I got up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
I spent the entire weekend in the library studying.
